content: > this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern including all photo tutorials in one printable file without advertisements there is also a bonus garment schematic included in the pdf the crochet granny stitch top is the perfect vintage-inspired summer crochet top pair it with jean shorts a long skirt or wide leg pants for the perfect boho outfit with an on-trend boxy shape classic granny stitch and simple ribbing you ll want a crochet shirt in every color this free crochet top pattern ranges from sizes xs 5xl ** girls sizes are also available 2 ** purchase this crochet granny sweater kit aff 3 lion brand has a full kit of the crochet granny stitch top for women 4 available on their website the crochet kit includes your choice of colors and a digital copy of the crochet pattern **sizing** the pattern is written in women s sizes x-small small medium large x-large 2x-large 3x-large 4x-large 5x-large to fit chest 28-30 32-34 36-38 40-42 44-46 48-50 52-54 56 - 58 60 - 62 **instructions included for shortening or lengthening your top easily make a crochet crop top or crochet tunic ** **yarn** the sample in the photos was crocheted with lion brand 24/7 cotton dk prints in azul 80 g / 2 8oz / 219 yards / 200 m / 100% cotton other dk weight 3 yarns can be substituted as long as gauge is met **pattern notes** the pattern is a written pattern and also includes a garment schematic and photo tutorials where needed summer top design is an a crocheted simplicity original design join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases giveaways sales and testing opportunities https //www facebook com/groups/906744872727855/ you can also find me on etsy a crocheted simplicity jennifer renaud all of my patterns are written in standard american terms unless noted otherwise please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take any refunds however i do offer customer support and will try my best to help you with the instructions © 2023 designed by jennifer renaud aka a crocheted simplicity all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are property of a crocheted simplicity the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and charity sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to a crocheted simplicity is greatly appreciated no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from jennifer renaud 1 https //www acrochetedsimplicity com/crochet-granny-stitch-top-women/ 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/girls-crochet-granny-stitch-top 3 https //shrsl com/45z0y 4 https //shrsl com/45z0y
